activities.loc: Courtroom B, Third Floor - North Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Extradition-Arrest Prior to Requisition (Winnebago Co, IL)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Russell C. Martin

records.addlTxt:
8:10 AM Defendant Russell C. Martin in court, in custody.  Attorney Walter H Isaacson in court for Russell C. Martin.  Attorney David S Olson in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant waives right to extradition freely and voluntarily; signs waiver in open court. Bond revoked.
Review hearing scheduled for January 13, 2023 at 09:45 am.
Extradition hearing on October 13, 2022 at 08:15 am.

10:13 AM Defendant Russell C. Martin in court, in custody from the Rock County Jail.  Attorney Walter H Isaacson appeared by video for Russell C. Martin.  Attorney David S Olson in court for State of Wisconsin.
Extradition hearing scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 08:15 am.
Extradition hearing on August 26, 2022 at 10:00 am.

02:36 PM Defendant Russell C. Martin in court by video means, in custody at the Rock County Jail and with attorney Walter H Isaacson by video means.  David S Olson appeared for the State of Wisconsin in person.  Extradition hearing scheduled for August 26, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Extradition hearing on June 22, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Activity: Adjourned initial appearance
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

9:09 AM Defendant Russell C. Martin in court in custody at the Rock County Jail by video with attorney Walter H Isaacson by video. David S Olson appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Remand to branch 6 for scheduling of extradition hearing.
Adjourned initial appearance on June 13, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Activity: Initial appearance
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

3:36 PM Defendant Russell C. Martin in court in custody by video at the Rock County Jail with attorney Faun Michelle Moses and intern Olivia Long by video. Noah M Tylenda appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Address verified. Cash bond set of $5,000.00 with conditions. Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 24, 2022 at 3PM.
